short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick menu extension for SFMC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description: The Salesforce Marketing Cloud Quick Navigation extension is a powerful tool that enhances your browsing experience within Salesforce Marketing Cloud. With this Chrome extension, you can quickly access various tools and key sections of Marketing Cloud by opening them in new tabs.

Key Features:

Fast Navigation: With this extension, you can quickly access your favorite Salesforce Marketing Cloud tools directly from the Chrome browser. No need to navigate through multiple pages or menus to reach your desired sections.

Open in New Tabs: The extension allows you to open each Marketing Cloud section or tool in a new browser tab. This enables you to keep multiple sections open simultaneously and swiftly switch between them without having to go back or lose your current view.

Section Customization: You can customize your preferred sections and define which tools or pages you want to have quick access to. Personalize the navigation menu according to your specific needs for swift access to your most frequently used resources.

Intuitive and Easy to Use: The extension is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. The extension icon will be available in the Chrome toolbar, allowing you to access the quick navigation features effortlessly.

Boost Productivity: By enabling fast navigation and the ability to open sections in new tabs, the extension helps you save time and enhance your productivity when using Salesforce Marketing Cloud. Seamlessly switch between sections and manage your tasks more efficiently.

The Salesforce Marketing Cloud Quick Navigation extension is the ideal tool for Salesforce Marketing Cloud users who want to optimize their browsing experience and quickly access all the essential features and sections of the system. Make the most of your time and resources with this intuitive and powerful extension.
